post.body: @frijole *snicker*
RDU traffic for the lulz.
your keyboard is of insufficient manliness, then.
Well, how are you feeling then? :)
Ugh! I hate getting them dilated, no fun at all :(
RFE: /twirssi_update command to update to the latest version. :)
I can sometimes hear Linus /snoring/ from across the room. :) Also @twirssi seems to be working well now after the initial hiccup.
Getting into e-commerce, eh?
Lucky! I wish it would here. Now it's not even as warm as yesterday and still no snow *pout*
congratulations!!!
Did you already finish Equal Rites? The Luggage might hunt you down if you pick Twilight over Discworld!
Only from work!
"I want a girl with a mind like a diamond / I want a girl who knows what's best"
woohoo! <3 twirssi
It's worth the wait.
RFE: Warning when you go over the 140 character limit.
Fedoras are very stylish!
Meetings at 12, 2, 3, and 4 today. I dislike thursdays.
Upgraded my TMo SMS plan tonight. No waiting on hold, rep was cheerful and backdated it too so no overages this month. <3 them.
heading back to Nashua, a good time was had.
In Boston having dinner with a friend
Snow in Nashua last night: http://tinyurl.com/5f2xqf
IT SNOWED! :D :D :D
Uploading a video to youtube and playing with @twirssi
glee! getting promoted effective Jan 1st!
the apartment feels too empty now that @Jerseycat has gone back home :(
had an absolutely fantastic weekend. Going to be groggy as heck today though!
is awake earlier than he has reason to be.
New lens (70-200mm f/4L IS) arrives tomorrow, then off to Buffalo to visit the family on the 1st!
Great company and conversation at @jpallan and @crschmidt 's place, now headed back to Nashua. Pics and videos tomorrow!
For the first time in at least four years, I finally have a white christmas again! Yaaaay!
Listening to Sir Linus snoring on the sofa next to me. A quiet Christmas Eve isn't the worst thing ever.
This sucks, all my Christmas plans have fallen through. Pondering a first attempt at making Yiayia's baklava to mark the holiday instead
Behold ye noble habanero, ready to sacrifice itself for the greater good - my chili. http://tinyurl.com/9zfuow
Nashua-ites, any recommendations for anywhere that would be able to repair a tear in a leather jacket?
Made a perfect fool out of myself tonight, it seems. Ah well, it is what it is. Goodnight moon, goodnight twitter!
There's a mound of snow where my car was parked. Time to start excavating. Maybe I'll find buried treausre, how exciting! Where's my fed ...
Found random bits of photography miscellany, and the lens cap on the other side of the room. Of course.
Wonder what it says about me that I'm resorting to searching between the couch cushions for a missing lens cap. And not finding it, but ...
Baking cookies!
